website_summaries.verdict: For those who never want to leave their dog behind while they go on an adventure.
pros: Use this product as a bike trailer or as a jogging stroller
Holds up to 66 pounds, so is well equipped for up to medium-large dogs
Load your dog through either the front or the back entry
Trailer folds flat to make storing it easier
cons: No pockets come with this product and assembly can prove difficult

customer_reviews.title: Great bike trailer for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I purchased this dog trailer. It only took 10 min. to put them together and my dog and I were ready to go. Another good thing is that I don't feel much extra weight by this trailer with my 27LB dog in it. Every part of this product is well made and looks great. Big soft tires make ride smooth and you can make pretty steep turns. Also you have a choice to open front part of mesh window. So dog does not feel trapped in the small place and there is a short leash, you can attach to your dog which keep them inside of trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Things You Should Consider
customer_reviews.text: The two things I didn't think about when ordering this was how important pockets and a turning front wheel would be. There are absolutely no pockets or hooks. And the front wheel is stationary which makes turning or just staying on the sidewalk challenging and frustrating. The handle is also short and not adjustable and I'm 5'11 so I was slouching to reach the handle. Also the assembly instructions were extremely sparse. I'll probably be returning because of the wheel, height and pocket issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just barely okay
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn't have trusted all the positive reviews and done more research before buying this particular brand/model. So far I'm not impressed. The instruction booklet for assembly was a poorly photocopied(?) paper, so it was hard to tell what was what. The parts that hold the handlebar in place are nearly impossible to get tight enough, so the handle wobbles a little. I haven't tried this on my bike yet, but as a stroller it drags to the left. This gets annoying on longer walks. I'm hoping this is something that can be adjusted. If I hadn't purchased this online, I would be tempted to return it. However, the dog seems to like it, so I'll make do.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great item for price, but no breaks
customer_reviews.text: Really neat little 2 in 1 stroller/bike trailer, definitley worth purchasing. I mainly bought it for long hikes in the heat for my Jack russel/pug mix who's 10 yr and cannot last as long as us on long hikes. Also was looking for a bike trailer for him so this was well worth it. The only dislikes I have is that there is no emergency break anywhere on it, and it kind of free rolls on it's own so that's a pretty big con. Also, the front wheel doesnt pivot, it's on a straight bar so you have to lift the stroller to make turns. I would recommend, it's nice for the price. Easy to assemble and tranform.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Smith

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVE'S IT!
customer_reviews.text: My Dog Love's it! She gets up every morning runs out to make sure it is still there and cant wait to go for a ride. Only complaint I have is it doesn't have brakes so if you arnt paying attention it will roll away. The front wheel not swiveling is no big deal for me I lift the front to get up on anything / curb etc. I had to do the same with my old pet stroller anyway! The wheelsvare big and it makes it easy. If i could get a brake to add i will probably do that. When using it on the bike no complaints at all...its very nice and most My Dog Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog carrier
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dog carrier. Easy to assemble/disassemble. Great for my senior dog that can't walk very far anymore. Only 'complaint' is that no matter what I do, the front wheel veers slightly to the right. Not a huge deal though.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The one word to describe this product would be "phenomenal." It's a sturdy product that seems like it would cost hundreds of dollars more. My dog weighs 25 pounds and I can easily push this stroller with one finger and can also steer it with one finger. The pneumatic wheels have a lot to do with this. If I could give this more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Teco

customer_reviews.title: Great dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my 30 pound dog, who had been limping on his back leg and was ordered by the vet to rest. He loves his walk, and I didn't want to leave him home while walking my other (high energy) dog daily. This stroller allows him to come along on walks while resting, and he has come to love it. It rides smoothly and steers great (I walk him mostly on old, uneven sidewalks). I do put a blanket on the bottom to add cushy comfort. Great product, glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: ashley3601

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store in home or apartments
customer_reviews.text: This is second one in the smaller size from this company. I also bought the red larger one twice. It was stole. A few weeks ago so decided togetsmaller one again. It is not as stable but I put tiles in the bottom to hold it down. I have trouble keeping this one going straight. I usually end up getting better tires and heavy duty inner tubes for tires when these wear out. We walk twice a day for 5 miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was easy enough. The canvas came ripped at the corner near a hinge. It appears to be caught when they packaged it up. The front wheel is not true so the stroller turns left when pushed. It attaches to my bike easily and my dog loves riding in it! The trailer goes over dips and bumps easily and it tows great
customer_reviews.author: Grace Martin

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love it! Easy to hook On and off my ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this four instead of five stars is because assembly of the handle bar was very difficult. It didn't fit right and would not just slide right in! I literally had to hammer them in. Otherwise I love it! Easy to hook On and off my bike and to itch it from trailer to stroller. Very sturdy and between the orange color and the orange flag that comes with it, it stands out to cars driving by.
customer_reviews.author: Corina H.

customer_reviews.title: Good product awful instructions
customer_reviews.text: So far my dogs seem happy with it, but the instructions were terrible! You really have to do your best to figure out where things go and how to attach since the instructions are not at all detailed. Would have given 5 stars of it weren't for the instructions and the fact that the inside has minor defects.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not all the parts fit like they should. I couldn’t use it for all functions due to this. Very disappointed. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: This is outstanding for dog up to 50 lbs. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding for dog up to 50 lbs. Just what I needed for little Jack Russell. Thanks again.. Yes he just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this unit. Delivery was on time, easy to assemble and works great. Breaks down quickly for transport, folds down almost flat. Wheels and handle can be removed easily. Easy to attach to bike. We have used it in both configurations and our 40 pound standard Schnauzer fits into it with no trouble. Not a lot of room left over but she can stand, sit or laydown without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the value!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because it has made my life and the life of my pet so much better! She is one year into rehabilitation and gets very tired in a short period of time. We love to hike and she missed it so much. Now she can get out and get some exercise and rest when needed. The wheels are what I have been looking for - not the plastic ones. I can think of only one thing to improve on - something that would lock the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: dmartin

customer_reviews.title: Milo and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My welsh corgi (approx 40 lbs) fits inside. He’s getting older and can’t run as far as when he was younger. It’s also a good work out towing an additional 40 lbs. Very happy I made the purchase. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H.H.

customer_reviews.title: The envy of the dogs in our neighborhood!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! We use it for our 2 Italian greyhounds. The floor is not soft so we bought a bolster pad. Packaging could have been better. One of the reflectors arrived broken to bits. On a positive side we contacted the company and they replaced it. No problems. Great for long walks and hikes. Our girls love being able to go with us.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Lauterback

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I only got it as a stroller to push but it's also nice for a bike! The only thing I have an issue with is that the front wheel has a slight angle issue and wants to pull to the left more but other than that I love it! It's nice and roomy too!
customer_reviews.author: Cerina F.

customer_reviews.title: Push and carry....
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I put a little comfortable doggie matt in and off I went so able to push the older arthritic dog at same time walk the younger one plus bring water, treats and poop bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Durand

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made dog jogger
customer_reviews.text: Using this for our older dog so we can continue going for walks. She seemed to adjust fairly quickly to the walk/ ride concept. I like the style and it glides and is not a bumpy ride.
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STROLLER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this stroller!! I have 2 Yorkies and a Chihuahua and they all can fit comfortably in it. I mainly purchased this because my dogs are getting older and don’t last as long on walks anymore. So this allows me to take them on walks and when their little bodies are too tired to continue ... I can put them in this stroller so they can rest while we finish the walk together ♥️ The item did come dinged and scratched in some places but other than that - it’s one of the best purchases I’ve made for me and my pups!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth ride for two shih tzus.
customer_reviews.text: My two shih tzus are very happy with their new ride. There is plenty of room for both dogs (14lbs and 20lbs) to fit comfortably. My only problem is with the handlebar which is rather loose so it wiggles a lot however it doesn't seem like it will fall off it's just irritating. Overall though it's a very smooth ride for my pups so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hdaysdca

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly dog that has had surgery on both his knees so he could still be able to go on walks with his younger sister. The assembly was straightforward enough but the front wheel was bent and therefore it pulls to the left. The other 2 wheels were placed on top of each other so the wheel spokes were intertwined and unnecessarily difficult to separate. I've had this for not even 2 weeks and the fabric has begun to tear. Overall I would definitely not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Its very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like my doggie stroller i take my 3 small little doggies when I do my walks and the wheels are strong but smooth not bumppy this decently a great buy ,
customer_reviews.author: Monique Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were bad. But it was very easy to assemble. This is fantastic. Our dog is a 30 lb Sheltie and he loves it. Best gift I’ve ever given.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this! I use it as the dog stroller for walking my two small dogs that both have medical issues that make it difficult for them to walk. The stroller has allowed me to still take them out for a walk. I had an issue with the front wheel and contacted the seller. They handled the problem above expectations and very quickly. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. Very useful and brought much joy to our dog. She is older and needed a way to keep up with us and come along. This was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Riding in style!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-made. Assembled easily with no issues. It's better than expected. Our 11 yr, old, 18 lb. dog fits well and is very comfy with his pillow bed inside. It's also handy for carrying water bottles, phone and leash while we walk. Our walks were getting harder for him at the finish so now when he's tired, he just hops in and enjoys the ride home. Happy dog and happy owners!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best gift for your pets: stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stroller for pets. Those advertised as a dog stroller...I bought it for my 2 cats. They love the ride and I get to take long walks without leaving them home, This stroller is easy to maneuver and looks great
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe how fast we got this pet trailer. Also was very easy to put together and my dog loves it. These people and their products are # one rated
customer_reviews.author: Gene R. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Ready for a stroll
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble we have not used it yet for our dog. It it seems very sturdy and should last a long time. We were disappointed that it did not arrive at the time it was promised and we were unable to use it for a weekend getaway. The hardest part about the assembly was putting in the stabilizer bar that holds the canopy open @its designed width was very hard to put in. Putting on and taking off the wheels is a real Breeze and that should make it easy to fold up
customer_reviews.author: Duane F Cadotte

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of the stroller It definitely large enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I .bought this so I can take my two dogs on bike rides or walks with me. I like the size of the stroller It definitely large enough for my two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: BOSS

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, steers easy but would be exceptional if the front wheel swiveled and wasn’t fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Its a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product!! Love it!! May I suggest, provide soft rubber caps to cap off ends of screws where the handlebar is attached to the cab and ends of screws are exposed, both inside and outside cab. Additionally, maybe something that is easily foldable for transport and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jay

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! They hop in on their own ready to stroll. One of the dogs even sleeps in it!
customer_reviews.author: Gooberella

customer_reviews.title: Needs a brake
customer_reviews.text: I wish this buggy had a brake, trying to put your dog in without a brake or someone to hold it is almost impossible. I purchased because my French Bulldog has a torn ACL and can only walk a short distance, so I push the buggy and put her in when she's tired, but it's just so hard to get her in without a brake because it keep rolling away from you.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Jackson loves it, so do I!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, next day!!! Very easy assembly, sturdy and well made. I rode my bike with my 5lb Yorkie; it's lightweight and easily maneuvered. Jackson loved the ride!!! Very pleased with my purchase!!! Ciclavia, here we come!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trailer!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have ever made! My two dachshunds look so cute riding in this and they love it! We can't wait to ride on the beach with them. It matches my fiances bike perfectly too. Super sturdy. Good construction. Rides well.
customer_reviews.author: KMMxxx1

customer_reviews.title: The Dogs Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 Shitzus - Take all three for 10 mile rides every other night - they Just love it. Load them in the front door and let them out the back. Was easy to put together. Wife uses it as a stroller and I tow it behind my road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Gorske

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies enjoy this. New rideit’s great. Has a lot of room it’s light to push. I may get another one soon
customer_reviews.author: KBingham1972

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again. The reviews were spot on...it veers to the left, and the front wheel is stationary so it is difficult to turn. Not to mention it is not the colors it shows in the picture...it’s all yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy York

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for our small dog and for biking over curbs
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Researched lots of them and are very satisfied; width, zippered openings and the large front wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jablonski

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if front zippered panel could be opened from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if front zippered panel could be opened from the top so they can keep their head out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: My trailor/ stroller has a rip and a tiny burn mark on the inside bottom near the rear. Ive taped it because returning makes no sense. I wont recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: margaret O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Good for a puppy
customer_reviews.text: Really liked dog stroller and my Great Dane puppy loved it! Even though he’s too big for it now he still try’s to climb in it when he’s in garage. I really wished there were pockets on it though.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and all
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and all, but I hate the fact that the front tire won't turn and it makes it a bit of a problem to go out with this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Eva R. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Description is not clear
customer_reviews.text: Easy to switch from stroller to bike trailer. Does not have the shock's that I wanted. Would not have ordered this one if I knew it came without the shock's.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly , was just what we wanted. Went on vacation with our two yorkies and used it every day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McChesney

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction! Our dogs love going for rides/walking their humans! We have also used it to carry gear on camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: JPAKRutherford

customer_reviews.title: This was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together. Great quality and both my Shih Tsu's ride very comfortably in it. Lots of ventilation to keep them from overheating. and the price was the lowest of any even close to this quality.
customer_reviews.author: cafegirl

customer_reviews.title: Used and damaged item
customer_reviews.text: My dog cart came to me used and damaged when I ordered it new
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Tire was warped. Have to buy new one. Other than that, it seems to be nice. Looks very nice. It just rides bumpy because of tire
customer_reviews.author: Jane G

customer_reviews.title: my three cats love this item and so does all my neighbors
customer_reviews.text: my three cats love this item and so does all my neighbors, definitely the best investment!!, especially that I'm retired with the U.S Army, so therapeutic
customer_reviews.author: Bgck7

customer_reviews.title: Fun times with my furry friend
customer_reviews.text: Great value, easy to put together! Would be great if it folded!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: I have a 40 pound Australian cattle dog that could not fit in this thing without it being like a coffin couldn't even sit up
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item if your dog is over 30 pounds listing says up to 66 pounds. I have a 40 pound Australian cattle dog that could not fit in this thing without it being like a coffin couldn't even sit up
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I suspect it's the equivalent to sitting in the back seat of a car with bad knees. He's 33 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Too short and not long enough. I got this because he has arthritis. I suspect it's the equivalent to sitting in the back seat of a car with bad knees. He's 33 lbs, yet you can see how his head and ears are well above the line. It's sturdy though. Seems safe.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, however our pet passed away sooner than we thought so we are not using this anymore..
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this item several times and it seems well made, folds and stores easily, rolls along nicely. Would have given it 5 stars if it had storage for a leash and water bottle although there is enough room inside the stroller to put small items.
customer_reviews.author: Dion

customer_reviews.title: This is great for me and my Shellie Sweetpea
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me and my Shellie Sweetpea. I feel more confident walking because of having the stroller keeps me balanced and of course she loves being outside.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of  books

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value.. I can’t wait to use it with my new Christmas puppy.. Assembly Instructions are a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Janet A Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: SO HAPPY I GOT THIS
customer_reviews.text: Me and my Pup Love this. I am so excited to take him on my runs with me. We recently lost his brother and now he hates to be alone so now he can be with me and have an excellent seat..lol Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: We use this every day. Our Yorkie is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this every day. Our Yorkie is getting old but still loves to go out walking with us. She just doesn't have the stamina she once had. Our pet taxi makes it easier on us as well as her.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dearing

customer_reviews.title: Bike/walking dog stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great price and well built. Great for biking but as far as walking and or jogging not as good. It only goes straight. The front wheel does not turn. Also the directions for putting together and using are not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and collapses easily for portability for camping trips! Great quality and our dog is loving it too!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Fox

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The handle tends to be a little loose ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The handle tends to be a little loose but the rest is good. good quality, and my dog is happy to go on walks now!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wallukait

customer_reviews.title: Champ love dog.
customer_reviews.text: I live in New York and I have to take the subway everyday so I used it on the subway today it worked very well ......thank you for my order ... the wheel in the front is a little long and the handles is a little high but it worked very well.....Champ love dog....
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Love

customer_reviews.title: All around product
customer_reviews.text: Simple, covers the bases well. I like the larger wheels, it makes most terrain easy. I can stand up and break down in just about 2 minutes. And the cats can go anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Donelin Hurry

customer_reviews.title: We both get a walkabout
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together altho I needed help with the top brace. I wasn't strong enough to get the brace between the upper part of the cab. It rolls easily and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Pet trailer
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Customer service Is helpful and highly skilled would buy again and I recommend others interested do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Pete N.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Daisy loves it! Was very impressed with the quality,not at all flimsy or floppsy'. Where ever we go with our "hoopty," people are always asking where we got it.Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great for my elderly sheltie, she fit nice and comfortable with room to turnaround. Made with great choice. Need to add extra padding on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Matches the color of our trike.
customer_reviews.author: JRE

customer_reviews.title: excellant
customer_reviews.text: We have a 14 yr old cock-a-poo that doesn't get around as well as he used to. We took this to the coast with us and it was excellent for our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller for my 11 year old bichon
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller for my 11 year old bichon. She sometimes refuses to walk on hot days but loves to ride so I can get my walk in. Usually on way home she wants out and walks all the way back so she gets her exercise.
customer_reviews.author: cathy w.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. The stroller fits my 28lb pup perfectly. Other than the canvas being very tight when trying to zip it is well built.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Poon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Works great for my 2 dogs, push or pull!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Brusco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Whippetmobile
customer_reviews.text: Great design for my two whippets. It's long and narrow. Only complaint is the floor of the carrier is very hard and my whippets like to lay when they ride - easily fixed by putting a memory foam pet mattress inside though! This trailer pulls so easily compared to my past trailer, the wheels are excellent. One of my whippets doesn't even want to leave the trailer once we get home!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend we love this trailer
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent ! I love it and so glad my doggies love to ride in it. They just jump right in :)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Our puppy had a bum leg and loves to run and ride with us. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Misty H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pets
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I use it for my 3 Chihuahuas. Rides smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frizzell

customer_reviews.title: Love it, super useful with the stroller and trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, super useful with the stroller and trailer capabilities in one. Arrived super quick with zero damage. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Drake T Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stroller / jogger. Easy to use, remove wheels and handle for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ran a 5k with this stroller and it moves great, my 9.5 year old corgi loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cooper

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dog "toy" we have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog "toy" we have ever bought. We have 4 very small dogs that all fit and they love going out for rides.
customer_reviews.author: Mtn. Peaks

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The cat loves it. I love it. It's very sturdy. Worth every penny. I usually don't write reviews. This is my 1st review ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mai

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough for a 50 pound bulldog. Not enough room to turn around. The inside had some tears and the stitching comjng apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: The front weal comes undo often. Also, when ...
customer_reviews.text: The front weal comes undo often. Also, when I attached to my bike, it tipped over very often. So, I really can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Disaapointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I will update after I use, but I am quite disappointed upon opening. The mesh window had a hole in it. The handle bar had cuts and was indented and mishapen. The handle also is very loose, I've had multiple people attempt to tighten the screws and no one can, so basically cannot be used a stroller, only bike trailer. Debating if I should contact company to return or not. Pretty disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: M R M

customer_reviews.title: Would like to send it back
customer_reviews.text: Would like to send it back, but I have to use it since it took so long for me to get it and hasle it was to get
customer_reviews.author: Darrel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It took our dog a single ride to destroy the mesh. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fer

product_meta.title: Sepnine 2 in1 pet Dog Bike Trailer Bicycle Trailer and Stroller Jogger 20303
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue/greyPet Bicycle Trailer and Jogger of Medium
Converse between trailer and jogger easily, no tool required
Steel structure
Capacity: 66lbs
16'' rear wheels/12' front wheel
Anti-slip floor with PE board/reflectors/safety flag included
Dimensions inside:26.8"*17.1"*20.1"
feature_bullets: Dual entry (front and back) design for easy loading of your pet
Medium size suitable for pets up to 66-pound
Safety leash avoiding pet jumping out
Trailer will fold down flat for easy storage when not in use
Front and rear access doors with mesh windows for optimal airflow and visibility
